name: 3ejoueur/overdog
description: A Craft CMS scaffolding project for 3e joueur

post-install-cmd: @php -r " define('HTSRC', 'web/.htaccess_' . getenv('ENVIRONMENT')); echo (file_exists(HTSRC) && copy(HTSRC, 'web/.htaccess')) ? HTSRC.' copied to web/.htaccess'.PHP_EOL : ''; "
@php craft install/check && php craft clear-caches/all --interactive=0 || exit 0
@php craft install/check && php craft migrate/all --interactive=0 || exit 0
@php craft install/check && php craft project-config/apply --interactive=0 || exit 0
